Text:
Recipe:
Take one chubby Japanese girl in her late 20s,
dress her up in night gown and have tiny-dick-sex
with her. Make sure she does not speak except for
'childish' little grunts and uncomfortable faces.

Not hot girl, not hot porn. Boring.
Strange that Japan cannot produce more Sailor
Moon-like porn, but always goes for chubby girls
in their thirties or late twenties and dress them up
as babies and try to hump them as if all actors are
tired overweight old dogs.
Panzer you r right to an extent. All depends on the production company. There are quite a few real fake ' lolitas' out there in JAV worth the watch.
